name: Diwali
description: The festival of lights, celebrating the victory of light over darkness.
significance: Major Hindu festival honoring Goddess Lakshmi.

name: Holi
description: The festival of colors, celebrating the arrival of spring.
significance: Victory of good over evil (Prahlada over Holika).

name: Raksha Bandhan
description: Celebration of the bond between brothers and sisters.

name: Dussehra
description: Vijayadashami, marking the end of Navaratri.
significance: Victory of Lord Rama over Ravana.

name: Janmashtami
significance: Celebration of the divine incarnation of Vishnu.
